title: Hello Bacsi - Trợ lý sức khỏe
description:
Hello Bacsi (health app) is a comprehensive, free health care application for individuals and families in Vietnam. This app provides tools for weight management, menstrual cycle, and pregnancy tracking, while also helping you easily schedule doctor appointments and consult on all health issues 247.

Outstanding features:

_ Ovulation calculator (menstrual cycle tracking, contraception, conception): Helps you easily track your menstrual cycle to calculate ovulation time. This feature is especially useful for planning conception or natural contraception. 

The application also provides records of physical symptoms and secretion status to assist in predicting the next menstrual cycle, helping you manage your reproductive health effectively.

_ Useful for pregnant mothers in pregnancy care: This feature helps pregnant women monitor their weight, calculate their due date, and provide useful articles about the stages of pregnancy. 

Pregnancy tools also calculate and monitor fetal development in each week of pregnancy, helping mothers monitor fetal movements, thereby helping pregnant women feel more secure throughout pregnancy.

_ Taking care of your baby: The application helps mothers create an online profile for their baby to track important vaccination schedules. At the same time, the tool helps mothers observe and evaluate their baby's development speed through growth charts in each stage to track the child's nutritional indicators, height, and weight in the first years of life. based on World Health Organization standards. In addition, the application has articles about children's health and pregnancy, so that mothers can gain more knowledge about caring for and raising their children effectively.

_ Calculating BMI: Do you want to know if you are overweight, underweight, or normal weight? With Hello Doctor, you can quickly calculate your BMI and BMR. 

_ Weight tracking: Weight tracking feature helps you check your daily weight and calculate your average weight index. You can set specific goals such as gaining or losing weight, helping you adjust your diet and exercise regimen.

_ Vietnamese food library: With a huge food library, you can easily calculate the number of calories consumed in each dish, help you track portions and calculate calories in Vietnamese dishes, such as the ratio carbs, proteins, fats, helping gymers and people who are eating clean, working out or following a weight loss regimen better manage nutrition.

_ Drug library: With a rich store of information about drugs and functional foods, the application provides full information about ingredients, uses, dosage, and side effects. This helps you better understand the medications you are using, ensuring safety and effectiveness for your health.

_ Medication reminder: The medication reminder feature helps you easily manage your daily medication process. You will never forget to take your medicine with the time and quantity reminder function.

_ Make an appointment for a remote examination and consultation: Hello Doctor helps you find and make an appointment with a doctor at a clinic near your home or make a remote appointment with a specialist. You just need to choose a doctor, describe your condition and choose a suitable date and time - very convenient, no need to wait.

_ Health consultation with smart AI: With AI artificial intelligence, you can ask questions about any health problem and get answers immediately. AI is trained based on large data sources from health information consulted by specialized doctors. 

_ Verified medical knowledge: The application provides more than 20,000 health articles edited by medical experts. Articles are classified according to topics that interest you such as pregnant women's health, men's health, women's health, diabetes, cardiovascular disease... helping you easily choose content that you like and is suitable for your needs. personal needs.

Download now and start your comprehensive health care journey!

Note: The content of the application is for reference purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always seek medical advice from your doctor or healthcare provider with any medical questions.

This app provides tools for weight management, menstrual cycle, and pregnancy tracking, while also helping you easily schedule doctor appointments and consult on all health issues 247.

_ Ovulation calculator (menstrual cycle tracking, contraception, conception): Helps you easily track your menstrual cycle to calculate ovulation time. This feature is especially useful for planning conception or natural contraception.

The application also provides records of physical symptoms and secretion status to assist in predicting the next menstrual cycle, helping you manage your reproductive health effectively.

_ Useful for pregnant mothers in pregnancy care: This feature helps pregnant women monitor their weight, calculate their due date, and provide useful articles about the stages of pregnancy.
